titles.title: Commodity Distribution Program Reform Act of 1987
A bill to amend the National School Lunch Act to improve the administration for the commodity distribution program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Nutrition and Investigations.
Subcommittee on Nutrition and Investigations. Hearings held.
Subcommittee on Nutrition and Investigations. Provisions of measure incorporated in S. 305.

calendar.text: Committee on Agriculture. Provisions of measure incorporated into measure S. 305 ordered to be reported.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Commodity Distribution Program Reform Act of 1987 - Amends the National School Lunch Act to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to take specified actions to modify the commodity distribution program, including: (1) quality testing and monitoring; (2) making items available in optional sizes and forms; and (3) developing and monitoring distribution.
